<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="title=Flying%2BAn%2BSSTO%2Bthat%2Bfits%2Bin%2Ba%2BCargobay&channel=monev44&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&chapter_id=5277020"></object><br/>Grab some Batt Man batteries and watch monev44 fly an SSTO that fits in a cargo bay!</p>
hey i was wondering if i could get a download to this?
Well monev made it to twitch thursdays, just not the video I had figured :3
Monev, it took you long enough to get your very own Twitch Thursday

Well monev made it to twitch thursdays, just not the video I had figured :3

As far as i'm concerned this is better. Showing off my build and piloting skills, not just some booms.

Thanks Squad!

I uploaded this clip to my youtube channel, and there's a download link in the description there.

there's also videos I made before I started streaming.

Wow, that's impressive! I suspect you could even squeeze a fair bit more performance out of it if you replaced all those draggy 1X solar panels with a couple of 1X6 units. When I paved my (much larger and clunkier) SSTO with those I found it really slowed it down a lot.
